title: Bloodmoon champion
body:
Why is {{champion:164}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:245}}  on the list of champions

but none of  {{champion:45}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:5}}{{champion:143}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:9}}  ?

replies.body:
Because all of them can be played like assassins, and almost none of the champions you listed afterwards can be? 

{{champion:76}} {{champion:56}} are literally the only champions you listed that are assassins. I feel like they could have been put in instead of {{champion:80}} {{champion:157}}, but everything else is fine.

Being able to kill you in under 3 seconds =/= Assassin. Also, none of those champions you put up there are even remotely close to being assassins except for Nidalee, Twitch, and Quinn, but Quinn is pushing it

> [{quoted}](name=A Koichi Pose,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YEm69qlw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-12T00:08:14.664+0000)
>
> Being able to kill you in under 3 seconds =/= Assassin. Also, none of those champions you put up there are even remotely close to being assassins except for Nidalee, Twitch, and Quinn, but Quinn is pushing it

My assassin master yi skin begs to differ.

> [{quoted}](name=A Koichi Pose,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YEm69qlw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-12T00:08:14.664+0000)
>
> Being able to kill you in under 3 seconds =/= Assassin. Also, none of those champions you put up there are even remotely close to being assassins except for Nidalee, Twitch, and Quinn, but Quinn is pushing it

you disregarded the premise
because riot said so, they handpicked the featured champs for the mode anybody that could either burst or outplay the others while also being able to be burst down or putplayed themselves
